00023 MouseController::MouseController(Scene* scene)
00024 {
00025         m_Scene = scene;
00026         m_AssemblyMediator2D = new AssemblyMediator2D();
00027         m_AssemblyMediator3D = new AssemblyMediator3D();
00028         m_GLCameraMediator2D = new GLCameraMediator2D();
00029         m_GLCameraMediator3D = new GLCameraMediator3D();
00030         m_WallMediator       = new WallMediator();
00031         m_Mediator = m_AssemblyMediator3D;
00032 }

00052 void MouseController::setMediator(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00053 {
00054         //get mouse coords from event
00055         updateMouse(event);
00056 
00057         //connect the matching mediator
00058         switch ((buttonType)event.getMouseEvent().GetButton())
00059         {
00060         case LEFT_BUTTON:
00061                 //if mode is drawing walls and left button pressed
00062                 if (m_Mediator->getTranslation() == DRAWWALL)
00063                 {
00064                         //draw only walls in 2d canvas
00065                         if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00066                         {
00067                                 m_Mediator = m_WallMediator;
00068                         }
00069                         //in 3d canvas move as expected
00070                         else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00071                         {
00072                                 m_Mediator = m_AssemblyMediator3D;
00073                                 event.setCamRotatedX(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedX());
00074                                 event.setCamRotatedY(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedY());
00075                                 event.setCamPosition(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getPosition());
00076                                 setAssemblyMediator(event);
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079                 //otherwise move object normally
00080                 else
00081                 {
00082                         event.setCamRotatedX(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedX());
00083                         event.setCamRotatedY(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedY());
00084                         event.setCamPosition(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D()->getPosition());
00085                         m_Mediator = m_AssemblyMediator3D;
00086                         setAssemblyMediator(event);
00087                 }
00088                 break;
00089         case MIDDLE_BUTTON:
00090                 //move cam around in 2d canvas
00091                 if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00092                 {
00093                         //point to 2D mediator if event from canvas 2D
00094                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator2D;
00095                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera2D());
00096                 }
00097                 //move or rotate cam in 3d mode
00098                 else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00099                 {
00100                         //else, point to 3D mediator if event from canvas 3D
00101                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator3D;
00102                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D());
00103                 }
00104                 break;
00105         case RIGHT_BUTTON:
00106                 //move cam around in 2d canvas
00107                 if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00108                 {
00109                         //point to 2D mediator if event from canvas 2D
00110                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator2D;
00111                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera2D());
00112                 }
00113                 //move or rotate cam in 3d mode
00114                 else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00115                 {
00116                         //else, point to 3D mediator if event from canvas 3D
00117                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator3D;
00118                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D());
00119                 }
00120                 break;
00121         }
00122 
00123         if (event.getMouseEvent().GetWheelRotation())
00124         {
00125                 if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00126                 {
00127                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator2D;
00128                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera2D());
00129                 }
00130                 else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00131                 {
00132                         m_Mediator = m_GLCameraMediator3D;
00133                         m_Mediator->setGLCamera(m_Scene->getGLCamera3D());
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 
00137         //setup mediator starting position
00138         m_Mediator->initialize(event);
00139 }

00146 void MouseController::activateMediator(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00147 {
00148         if (m_Mediator->translate(event) == 0)
00149         {
00150                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00151         }
00152 }

00189 void MouseController::updateMouse(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00190 {
00191         mouse_x = event.getMouseEvent().GetX();
00192         mouse_y = event.getMouseEvent().GetY();
00193 }
00194 
00195 void MouseController::setAssemblyMediator(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00196 {
00197         Assembly* selectedAssembly = NULL;
00198 
00199         if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00200         {
00201                 //point to 2D mediator if event from canvas 2D
00202                 m_Mediator = m_AssemblyMediator2D;
00203                 //check for assembly id from click
00204                 selectedAssembly = (m_Scene->getCanvas2D())->selection(m_Scene->getRootAssembly(), m_Scene->getGLCamera2D(), mouse_x, mouse_y);
00205         }
00206         else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00207         {
00208                 //else, point to 3D mediator if event from canvas 3D
00209                 m_Mediator = m_AssemblyMediator3D;
00210                 //check for assembly id from click
00211                 selectedAssembly = (m_Scene->getCanvas3D())->selection(m_Scene->getRootAssembly(), m_Scene->getGLCamera3D(), mouse_x, mouse_y);
00212         }
00213 
00214         if (selectedAssembly != NULL)
00215         {
00216                 //set assembly mediator target to selected object
00217                 m_Mediator->setAssembly(selectedAssembly);
00218         }
00219         else
00220         {
00221                 m_Mediator->setAssembly(NULL);
00222         }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void MouseController::setSelected(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00226 {
00227         Assembly* selectedAssembly = NULL;
00228 
00229         if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS2D)
00230         {
00231                 selectedAssembly = (m_Scene->getCanvas2D())->selection(m_Scene->getRootAssembly(), m_Scene->getGLCamera2D(), mouse_x, mouse_y);
00232         }
00233         else if (event.getCanvasID() == CANVAS3D)
00234         {
00235                 selectedAssembly = (m_Scene->getCanvas3D())->selection(m_Scene->getRootAssembly(), m_Scene->getGLCamera3D(), mouse_x, mouse_y);
00236         }
00237 
00238         if (selectedAssembly != NULL)
00239         {
00240                 //select assembly (move to IS_SELECTED group)
00241                 m_Scene->selectAssembly(selectedAssembly);
00242         }
00243 }
